筗字的基本解释

筗
zhòng
古书上说的一种竹。
古乐器。

筗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhòng］
［《集韻》直衆切，去送，澄。］
(1)竹名。
(2)古管乐器。

筗字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　筗； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页884第06
【集韻】直衆切，音仲。【說文】中籥也。或省作仲。【爾雅·釋樂】大籥謂之產，其中者謂之仲。　又【字彙補】竹名。

筗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
筗字的起名意思

古书上说的一种竹。古乐器。

Shao
Basic explanation of words
Shao
zhòng
A kind of bamboo mentioned in ancient books.
Ancient musical instrument.
Shao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhòng］
["Ji Yun" cut straight to the crowd, go to send, clear. ]
(1) Bamboo name.
(2) Ancient wind instruments.
Shao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　筗; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 884 Page 06
[Ji Yun] Straighten the crowd, and the sound is in the middle. 【Said the text】Zhong Xu also. Or the province is in the middle. [Erya·Shile] Daxue is called the property, and the one among them is called the middle.　[Words complement] bamboo name.
Shao
